# CSSO installation

## Install using npm

Prerequisites:

* [NodeJS 0.8.x](http://nodejs.org)
* [npm](http://github.com/isaacs/npm/)

To install (global):

* run `npm install csso -g`

To update:

* run `npm update csso`

To uninstall:

* run `npm uninstall csso`

## Install using git

Prerequisites:

* [git](http://git-scm.com/)

To install:

* run `git clone git://github.com/css/csso.git`
